entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northeast 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 9:50 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm.
